mapper.select: select * from product order by product_no desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (product_no , product_name, product_price, desc_text, desc_img, left_cnt, category, product_img, company, discount_pct) VALUES(product_no.nextval, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{descText}, #{descImg}, #{leftCnt}, #{category}, #{productImg}, #{company}, #{discountPct});
